mapper.select: SELECT MSC0056M_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL

SELECT m0056m.ID ,m0056m.TITLE ,m0056m.MASTER_CODE ,m0056m.MODULE_TYPE ,m0056m.PLATFORM ,TO_CHAR(m0056m.START_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(m0056m.END_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') END_DATE ,m0056m.STUS_CODE_ID FROM MSC0056M m0056m WHERE 1=1 AND m0056m.ID = #{campaignId}

SELECT T1.PROMO_ID , T1.PROMO_MTCH_ID , T1.PROMO_CODE , T1.PROMO_DESC , T1.PROMO_TYPE_ID , T3.CODE_NAME AS PROMO_TYPE_NAME , T1.PROMO_APP_TYPE_ID , T2.CODE_NAME AS PROMO_APP_TYPE_NAME , T1.PROMO_SRV_MEM_PAC_ID , TO_CHAR(T1.PROMO_DT_FROM, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS PROMO_DT_FROM , TO_CHAR(T1.PROMO_DT_END, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS PROMO_DT_END , T1.PROMO_STUS_ID , T1.PROMO_UPD_DT , T1.PROMO_UPD_USER_ID , T1.PROMO_IS_TRIAL_CNVR , T1.PROMO_PRC_PRCNT , T1.PROMO_CUST_TYPE , T1.PROMO_DISC_TYPE , T1.PROMO_RPF_DISC_AMT , T1.PROMO_DISC_PERIOD_TP , T1.PROMO_DISC_PERIOD , T1.PROMO_FREESVC_PERIOD_TP , T1.PROMO_ADD_DISC_PRC , T1.PROMO_ADD_DISC_PV , T1.EMP_CHK , T1.EX_TRADE , T1.B2B , T4.NAME STATUS , T1.STK_SIZE STK_SIZE , T1.CHS FROM SAL0017D T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M T2 ON T1.PROMO_APP_TYPE_ID = T2.CODE_ID AND T2.CODE_MASTER_ID = '320' LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M T3 ON T1.PROMO_TYPE_ID = T3.CODE_ID AND T3.CODE_MASTER_ID = '76' LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0038M T4 ON T4.STUS_CODE_ID = T1.PROMO_STUS_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.PROMO_STUS_ID = 1 AND T1.VOUCHER_PROMOTION = 1
AND T1.PROMO_APP_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND #{promoDt} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(T1.PROMO_DT_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(T1.PROMO_DT_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND UPPER(T1.PROMO_CODE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{promoCode})||'%'
AND UPPER(T1.PROMO_DESC) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{promoDesc})||'%'
AND T1.PROMO_ID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY PROMO_DESC ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(VOUCHER_PROMO_ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS COUNT FROM MSC0058D WHERE ID = #{campaignId} AND PROMO_ID = #{promoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSC0058D ( VOUCHER_PROMO_ID ,ID ,PROMO_ID ,CRT_DT ,CRT_BY ) SELECT MSC0058D_VOUCHER_PROMO_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{campaignId},#{promotionPackageId},SYSDATE,#{userId} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT ID,PROMO_ID FROM MSC0058D WHERE ID = #{campaignId} AND PROMO_ID = #{promotionPackageId}) AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(B.DETAIL_ID) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS EDITABLE FROM MSC0056M A JOIN MSC0057D B ON A.ID = B.ID WHERE A.ID = #{campaignId}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DETAIL_ID) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM MSC0057D WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{campaignId} AND CUST_EMAIL IS NOT NULL AND ORD_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT VOUCHER_PROMO_ID,PROMO_ID FROM MSC0058D m0058d WHERE 1=1 AND m0058d.ID = #{campaignId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MSC0058D WHERE PROMO_ID = #{promoId} AND ID = #{campaignId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DETAIL_ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS VALID FROM MSC0057D WHERE VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode} AND ID = #{campaignId} AND STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND CUST_EMAIL IS NULL AND ORD_ID IS NULL

SELECT A.VOUCHER_CODE,A.CUST_EMAIL,A.SALES_ORD_NO,C.CODE_ID AS PLATFORM_ID,C.CODE_NAME AS PLATFORM_NAME FROM MSC0057D A JOIN MSC0056M B ON A.ID = B.ID JOIN SYS0013M C ON B.PLATFORM = C.CODE_ID WHERE A.VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(PRE_ORD_ID) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS VALID FROM SAL0213M WHERE 1=1 AND VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode} AND STUS_ID NOT IN (10)
SELECT * FROM MSC0059D WHERE EMAIL_SENT_STUS IS NULL OR EMAIL_SENT_STUS = 1

SELECT A.VOUCHER_CODE,A.CUST_EMAIL, C.MAIL_ID FROM MSC0057D A JOIN MSC0056M B ON A.ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN MSC0059D C ON A.MAIL_ID = C.MAIL_ID WHERE A.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND B.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND A.USED = 1 AND A.MAIL_ID IS NOT NULL AND C.EMAIL_SENT_STUS IS NULL OR C.EMAIL_SENT_STUS = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE MSC0059D SET EMAIL_SENT_STUS = 4 ,UPD_DT = SYSDATE ,UPD_BY = #{userId} WHERE 1=1 AND MAIL_ID = #{mailId}
mapper.select: SELECT MSC0059D_MAIL_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSC0059D ( MAIL_ID, EMAIL_TYPE, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_PARAMS, TEMPLATE_NAME, EMAIL, NAME, EMAIL_SENT_STUS, CRT_DT, CRT_BY ) VALUES ( #{mailId}, #{emailType}, #{emailSubject}, #{emailParams}, #{templateName}, #{email}, #{name}, #{emailSentStus}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(MASTER_CODE) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS COUNT FROM MSC0056M WHERE MASTER_CODE = #{masterCode}

SELECT /* A.VOUCHER_CODE,A.CUST_EMAIL,*/ A.ORD_ID, LISTAGG(B.PROMO_ID,';') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY B.PROMO_ID) AS PROMO_ID, LISTAGG(C.PROMO_CODE || C.PROMO_DESC,';') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY C.PROMO_CODE) AS VARIATION FROM MSC0057D A LEFT JOIN MSC0058D B ON A.ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN SAL0017D C ON B.PROMO_ID = C.PROMO_ID WHERE A.VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode} AND ROWNUM = 1 GROUP BY A.VOUCHER_CODE,A.CUST_EMAIL,A.ORD_ID
